content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the jacuzzi at 8pm est, saw a very bright, yellow light falling for about 15 seconds in the west, then disappearing. noticed it because it was brighter than the brightest star and falling straight down.
content.summary: Saw a bright yellowish light, brighter than a star falling straight down then disappearing above the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: This was taken by a friend that was just taking a picture of the view of her new house,when i was doing back up i saw this and amplied it
content.summary: White oval

content.detailedDescription: Took picture of odd sunset with iphone. noted several reddish vertical projections. noted dark lines within the projections after picture was taken, not sure if cloud shadow, what do you guys think.
content.summary: Several objects at sunset.

content.detailedDescription: Wife went out to the car to get her wallet. she looked nw across sod field and told me that she seen 6-8 redish orange lights flashing and hovering. she got me to come outside and look. when i looked there were only two. suddenly one went straight up a little bit then did a 90 degree turn left and took off really fast. it disappeared. then the other one had another one come out of it. it went straight up for a little while. then the stationary one started to go up at the same rate of speed as the other one. then they both shot straight up and were gone.
content.summary: Wife seen first(6-8). told me to look, seen multiple with more appearing.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving in the car on i-77 when i looked to my right and saw something i have never seen in the sky before. what looked to be a huge rod going straight up into the sky. after further observation it was clear that this was a trail of some kind. the strange part about it was that it did a countrclockwise full turn around, changing in width, color, and direction. 

in my heart and mind all i could think about was that this was not a natural cloud formation. what is was will always be beyond me.

the anomaly was unvisible when night set in.

i will be keeping my eyes more open to the skies of the carolinas from now on.
content.summary: A trail unlike i have ever seen before, rotating counterclockwise and changing in size and shape

content.detailedDescription: Ufo back again...Tube saintsdola
content.summary: Ufo louisiana day 4

content.detailedDescription: My 7 year old said mommy look at that airplane it looks like it is going to land right here, on centennial olympic pkway so as i am driving i turn to my left to look at what she was talking about and i said baby girl that is no airplane it is clear and hovering. i told her it was a spaceship and she started crying at once realizing that it was still, and she said what does that mean for us. i was driving and told my little girl to keep her eye on the object until i could pull over within 10 sec. i look back after stopping and it was totally out of sight. keep in mind we are in a wide open spot...I know that what we saw was nothing humans made...It had two white lights and two red...Flashing randomly.
content.summary: 7 year old spotted

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of november 12, 2011 i was sitting outside by a firepit with a friend she was facing me. 
about 5 minutes before i saw anything my neighbors dogs were barking like crazy, i looked in the direction of my neighbors house to make sure all was well, (it was) it could have been a deer... that said shortly after i noticed 3 bright golden solid round lights in a large triangle shape it was moving slowly and seemed to come out of nowhere moving slowly.  i said "oh-my-god" and pointed behind her.  we ran over to the edge of my property get a better look and then following the large triangle was a series of singular lights following the triangle one after another they were all flying as if they had just taken off.  they were going from very low to higher, but not very high in the sky.
i ran into the house and called for my two sons to come see it- i found this sight to be disturbing and i called 911 i thought perhaps it may be a terrorist event. i was transfered to a non-emergency number and explained what i was seeing and what was being witnessed by 4 adults. i have spent my day today trying to see if anyone else witnessed what we saw- there could be no way we were the only ones who saw that at that time. 7:30 pm is not all that late and the evening was mild. all the lights were going the same direction and there were over a dozen of the singular ones.
i live in a semi-rural area. my home is situated on 2 acres and there are a few small lakes in my neighborhood. i have never seen anything like this in my life. if there is a next time i will be sure to grab a camera.
content.summary: Initial cluster of 3 lights in a triangle form then saw a series of single lights of the same golden color one after another .

content.detailedDescription:
Because of the many accounts of people finding anomolous stuff in pictures that they didn't see with the naked eye, i will occasionally take random pictures of the sky and examine them on my computer. the very first time i did this back in 2005 i got a picture of 3 white lights in broad daylight.
 
on november 7th, 2011 i was in my backyard (baytown, tx) 
and took 2 pictures of the sky approx. 3 seconds apart. i did not see anything with the naked eye at the time. after uploading them to my computer, i opened them with a photoshop-type program so i could examine them closer. initially, i did not see anything (in the original picture, the object is only very faintly visible.) i know that simply adjusting the brightness and contrast of a photo can greatly enhance the visibility of things. i did this and immediately saw a curious dark line in the clouds in the first picture. so i used a few more techniques to enhance the photo further (sharpened it, negative filter, etc.) i was shocked at what became visible! it looks like a cigar-shaped object (or a disk-shape viewed from the side) with what appear to be dark "windows." i am attaching the original photo along with the enhanced ones. the object was not in the second picture taken almost immediately after.
content.summary: Saw cigar shaped object with

content.detailedDescription: Saw very bright white ball of light pass very fast in front of me while driving on 422 aroud the shelocta area.  passed horizontally in front of me for maybe 4 seconds across the sky, then vanished as if the light had just dissapeared or shut off. not a cloud in the sky to duck behind. not a shooting star, or a plane, helicopter, etc. never have seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Bright white light

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i saw this object when we went outside. we witnessed it hovering, moving up, making a change in direction and going right. we watch the night sky each night, we have never seen anything that looks like this. it was not jupiter or mars. we used a telescope to look at it, and saw a glowing sphere that changed colors. it seemed to have electricity pulsating all over the sphere, kinda like a plasma ball. it had almost all colors of the rainbow in it. main ones being white, red, blue, green. we had a measuring item to watch it rise up. we used the power lines. it started below the line and ended up way above the line and further off to the right. we know enough that we are pretty confident it was not a star or a planet. especially due to it's constant moving and changing directions in moving. it was very high up, i would actually say it was in space, not closer to earth. very distant appearance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnesses the object hovering, moving, and changing directions. glowing multiple colors!

content.detailedDescription:
(from my own emailed newsletter report)

this morning, about an hour before the break of dawn -- at 5:30 am., to be fairly exact -- i had the visitation of two ufos in the eastern sky! they appeared, like that first one about a week ago, as two medium-bright stars, not paired but fairly close to one another -- and yet behaving quite differently from last week's instance.

the one last week, if you'll recall, was on a very slow but definite track southward -- too slow to be any aircraft or even a satellite. this morning's pair had no such consistent track. they moved slowly, but quite erratically and, as noted, independently from one another -- generally southward, but sometimes up or downward. one of them remained visible for more than a half-hour.

i was able to track them pretty well with binocs because i was looking through the 'filter' of a leafless tree outside my window, a tree of many slim trunks that allowed me an easy measure of directional movement and relative speed. it was quite a display,and with two such sightings in a week's time, i have to assume that they are out-and-about so as to be on display at this particular time.

___________
[your questions alongside: 
1. in my apartment living room.
2. watching morning sky for daybreak.
3. early stars are rare here; my first thought is always aircraft.
4. it required binoculars to pick up movement, as detailed above.
5. amazed - for me, it was a second occasion, as noted above.
6. went gradually beyond adjoining building - by then in increasing daylight.
content.summary: Two of them, star-like, trending south, but often erratically (up/down)

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I have been getting hundreds upon hundreds of pictures in the last three years.The first was a fireball falling and then made a sharp right hand turn and zoomed off. since then i have gotten 'coins' that have designs,fuzzy round balls, bright sharp focused balls of red,blue,yellow,white.I even got five tiny lights running around like fireflys and when i 'brought them in' they looked like a kids amuement poark rides...Each in different colors and looking like a dolls shoe with antenna,a dart, a bat, etc. in one picture i got part of apparently a huge disc.With a pattern and a 'doorway' that these came from.They are alone at times.And other times there might be two together or three,four or even five. sometimes they are close touching and other times spaces in between.At times they are in a straight line while others it is curved in a triangle pattern.I hyave seen them materialize fairly low over our field and then disappear like in a invisable cloak leaving merely a thin see through cloudy mist. i have a picture of lighted area that is a triangle and two that arte like an oblong thick sheet.I've thought some were airplanes but after moving they stopped and stayed in one spot for fifteen minutes. some were flashes and others were solid lines of lights in a steady move. one night i was watching the sky but all of a sudden saw something i thought might be a star,..Even though it pulsated colors but was in the same place for months.One night it started to move and i have pictures (that with it's movement make it look 'blimplike')as it went toward the mt. light,..Then under it and went to the right...I have the whole series.I have all kinds of stories from watching these things.....The one i reported here saying nov. 3rd was the usual flashing lights but the moon was out and i saw a slanted streak that i wondered if it was a contrail.I took the picturte but when i brought it close it appears solid and a couple pictures show two things at each end protruding from it. then one picture showed something amazing.There is a clear image of a 'craft' between the slanted streak and the moon. (it looks like my mothers old bathtub with feet.) what's even more amaazing is i started to look back at some pictures i took in jan.Of this year and saw several pictures with a lot of 'garbage' but there was a see through misty cloud(tiny) and the shape was like the 'bathtub' i'd just got. i put it on the computer and was able to 'bring it out' of the background.It became a solid craft! you can see it very sharp and what it is made of. although we don't know what the material might be ,it 'looks like' a very thick thick plastic'!!!I really have too much information to write down. on tuesday the 8th of nov. at 6:30 at night i saw a, close down, huge line of lights heading toward me...There's a big story with this but after a while it changed size and then shape and eventually shot straight up into the sky where it became a tiny red dot.It then came over us and the pictures i got were of a green,two white and a red line...First straight lines,..Then wavy lines,..Then in some there were tiny lights in between the lines.I take all these pictures from the same place in my front yard. after seeing stuff so much, i go out and look a lot.I thought they were airplanes but to have ten blinking all around you for a half hour and then taking pictures so i could tell what was a plane and wasn't(and found they 'weren't)i just take everything.They end after a half hour and are gone with 'nothing' left.We have two neighbors plus my husband and myself seeing this stuff but we now have heard of at least ten or more staring to look too.(the 'bathtub' actually looks like the craft at the top of this page but yours is upside down.The rounded part belongs on the 'bottom'!)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.shape: Blimp,   Cone,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle
content.summary: These descriptions are for many sightings on different dates

content.detailedDescription: C:\documents and settings\dennis\my documents\tech science\the canadian national newspaper military officer reports extraterrestrial sighting.Mht
content.summary: Shoot down by by uss gg-67 shilo missile cruiser

content.detailedDescription: Blu orb sphere over my home.
content.summary: Blue orb over my home.

content.detailedDescription: At aproximately 10:40 i went out my home to walk the 3 small dogs i have and upon looking up i noticed a blue sphere hovering over my home in homestead. i grabed my i-phone and snaped couple of pictures and a video clip. it moved from a 90 degree angle in the sky to a 80 degree angle heading west bound. no sound, no pulsating lights, no nev red lights or other shape observed but the shape of a glowing blue sphere. the sphere then went up and disapeared.
content.summary: Blue glowing sphere over my home.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down interstate 24 east and around exit 11 at 0345 an object in the sky caught my eye. at first i thought it was a shooting star, but as i kept watching it, i noticed it was going slower than a normal shooting star. it was also larger than one, and the white color appeared to be pulsating in its brightness. the car in front of me hit their brakes, and i assumed it was because they saw it too. it was moving towards the northeast for approximately 10 seconds and then completely disappeared. afterwards, i knew i had seen something definitely out of the norm, and almost even stopped the car in front of me to see if they saw it too. i had very good feelings and wasn't fearful.
content.summary: Ufo changes direction then disappears in tn

content.detailedDescription:
After witnessing the same white objects the previous night, we awoke and went outside in the dawn hours and were flabergasted at the number of pinprick (small star size) objects within our viewing area. they were small but seemed to leave a brighter tail when they darted short distances and some brightened when hovering. we watched for awhile before i convinced my dad (,whom i was visting,) to go get his nikon coolpix 775 camera. this camera only takes 15sec of film at a time and i found the videos easier to see when only doubled from its original size (i even slowed it to half speed.) i took several at dawn and throughout the rising sun and into the afternoon. the sky filled with big puffy clouds and small patches of blue sky, and as the sun rose the multitude of objects not only became more noticable but were obviously manuvuering underneath these clouds and weren't as large or far away as the previous night. with the clouds as backdrop they were clearly defined orbs with definte edges and had a metalic surface almost like dull cast aluminum. when they moved they seemed to have a bluish or grey undefined tail about 3x thier length. we also noticed they would slow, hover, and then occasionly flash. we noticed that at times several orbs would then steadily move toward the first, and sometimes all would manuevering together in formations of as many as 7, or , especialy toward noon, other orbs would flash back, and still other times orbs would drift toward the flash orb who would dart (north/northeast mostly) very quickly out of view or vision with blue tails. though these objects were penciltip in size most of the time, there were so many with such erratic flight patterns, there has to be more witnesses. 
the final aspect, is my father asked several times if they weren't turning off or going dark when they performed these bullet darts out of our sight. i didn't notice any and he shrugged the split second glimpses. however, in one video (the one included) toward the last 4 seconds a larger, darker cigar shape zooms from the top middle of the screen to the bottom right. frame by frame shows what appears to be an erratic flight pattern as well. also visable is 9 or more of the little orbs (one of the best is to the right of the house's roofpoint about 1/3 the screen across). sorry for the poor quality, i found running at 1/2 speed and only double size seemed to work best. loop and look for others and the variety of flight patterns.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From morning to past noon countless small metallic orbs hover, fly, dart, and flash under the low clouds in the raintree area. a faster,darker object is caught on film.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 20,2011 my two sons and me were outside playing bad mitten and my oldest son had happened to look up in the sky and seen a gray matalic disk with orange and red lights at the bottom and the lights were spinning around at the bottom. at the top it had slight hump and the edges were kind of pointed and it had a round circle at the bottom.It made no noise what so ever. my oldest son said look momma up in the sky! i looked up and there i saw it. i was so amazed by it. it was just hovering over one of our trees. it was moving back and forth real slow.It went into the trees and came back out.We was watching it for a good 20 minutes. then all of a sudden it picked up speed and took off going north. 

on october 8,2011 my youngest son and i were sitting out on our front porch and my son looked up in the sky. he said momma what is that blue thing spinning in the sky? i was like what blue thing? so i got up and looked and there i saw a gray disk with blue lights spinning around near the bottom edge and it had a small hump at the top. i could not see  the bottom.It was  hovering right  over our property.I told my son to keep an eye on it while i ran inside and got my camera.So, i ran in and got my camera and came back out and was gonna start taking pictures, but my camera was dead. so i ran back inside and put it on charge for like two minutes.Then i came back outside to see if it was still there while my camera was chargeing.It was still there.So, i went back in the house to take my camera off charge.Then i went back outside and started snapping pictures of it.I took like 23 pictures of it.It was just moving all over the place.All of a sudden it fliped over on it side and started going up and down.I then got alittle worried that it might be trying to land.But,it had fliped back upright again.So, i decided to wave at it.Then that is when it started freaking out and was just moving so fast i couldn't keep up with it. we had our eye on it the hole time.But then it just disapered out of nowhere.That is how fast it was moving,i had no clue of where it went.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Grey silver disk the first one seen was july 20,2011 and it had red lights at the bottom.The second one seen was on october 8,2011 and it also was a gray disk,but had blue lights at the bottom this time.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone at the time of the sighting: 

i took the dog outside and something bright caught my eye to the east.  it was a very large bright white object hovering less than 500 feet from the ground.  it had appendages coming off of it and several other objects, which were balls of a duller white light going to and from the larger object. it looked like the smaller ones were docking with the larger craft, then leaving it. the smaller objects moved around the sky and went down to the ground and out of sight. i watched this for approximately 7 minutes, then called to report this.  the mufon investigator told me to go inside to get my camera to get some photos but when i returned the smaller objects were all gone.  my camera batteries were dead.  i watched the larger object for several more minutes but it did not move.  i got the dog and went inside because i started to feel anxious, then went back out again a few minutes later and the object was gone.
content.summary: Large stationary circular ufo with appendages and other objects moving to and from it

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west just after sundown and witnessed a glowing, pulsating white light ball very very slowly ascending vertically, including in front of clouds that were less than 25 miles away. once it reached the cloudline, it appeared to go out "like a light." camera review shows it rapidly accelerated westward, through the cloud, away from my position. this comes two days after a previous experience on the other end of town with a glowing/flashing red/orange orb, which i have seen in a pack of 10 before, but both stories are for separate reports. with regard to this incident, there were hundreds of potential witnesses traveling westbound on interstate 90 between cardwell and pipestone. i do not know if object was visible from butte on the other side of homestake pass, where this was ascending near.
content.summary: Driving west near pipestone, i90, looking towards homestake pass, sse of butte

content.detailedDescription: I did not witness the event. i read it in our local paper; the valley citizen, november 9, 2011 edition, volume iii, issue 45.  hope strong wrote the story ahout a local rancher who found his cow dead and mutilated on november 3, 2011, in a wheat field about 6 miles south of driggs, idaho.  you can read the story on valley citizen's facebook page.
content.summary: Mutilated cow found by rancher south of driggs, idaho

content.detailedDescription:
In my car, back road, near my home.  saw bright white light, like a very large star/planet, descend in distance.

no trail, no sound, no blinking or wavering.  larger than jupiter in the sky, bright white.  closest known similar object is a missile at night.  i do not know if it went past the horizon or if it landed, no explosion, did not slow before ground/horizon.  very fast.  faster than plane, helicopter, etc., slower than meteorite.

got out, walked up and down the road to see if it was a reflection, not a reflection on any object.  was very spooked.  i live in an area where we get a lot of military aircraft, and have seen many, but this was nothing like any of them i have seen.
content.summary: Bright white light descended quickly straight down.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on 90 from cleveland to buffalo, i saw a bright ball of white light flash on in the [dark cloudy] sky over lake erie for about 3 seconds and then go off. didn't think much of it. then it reappeared a few seconds later and quickly dove down towards the lake in a "u" pattern, behind trees and reemerged hovering for a second and then diving down quickly towards the lake, until being obscured behind some trees.
content.summary: Bright light over lake erie

content.detailedDescription: My father and i went outside at aprox 9:00pm on the bottom porch behind the house. looking at the moon, we both seperately noticed a dim, blue object moving steadily toward the aldebaran(,brighter red star directly below the moon.) thinking it just a satelite, we both imediately stopped and backed up to block the moon with the balcony above. it was then that we noticed another round object heading toward the first when it stopped and the first object shot perhaps a handspan across the sky southeast, fast enough to obviously appear elongated or having a small blue trail, and again hover then move slow. the second object began to quickly drift south then it too darted a short distance. at this point, we both attempted to keep an eye on both objects (which i said were a dim blue). it was then that several objects exactly like these were very obviously moving in straight, steady paths (at different speeds and in different n.S.E.W. directions), hovering, and very visably darting back and forth between the aldebaran and the several bright stars south of jupitar. it was at this time that i noticed a large white, red, and green flickering "star" that seemed to be dancing. i first dismissed it as a star but upon closer watch and using surrounding dimmer stars as points it was moving in distinct counterclockwise pattern aprox. half-dollar in width accelerating from drift to spurt to loop to drift to spurt,etc. my dad & i were able to verbally collaborate it's distinct direction and speed from various standpoints as it continued. we both turned our attentions back to the zooming blue orbs after ten minutes or so and noticed another identical object above venus moving west making similiar small circular patterns which disappear over the house. the first dancing object by that time had moved more to the northwest and continued slowly making its way beyond the neighboring houses, all the while continueing its orbital pattern. however it was about this time when we noticed the dusty blue orbs had seemed to dissapate as well and after another 15 or so minutes of seeing nothing out of the ordinary we retired inside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Multitude of dim erratic moving orbs manuevering in all directions and two brighter shapes slowly drifting west moving in small counterclockwise circles of varying speeds

content.detailedDescription:
On friday nov 11th i was getting ready to leave my home and go to dinner with my wife the time was 6 35 pm . i was in my car already parked at curb as wife exited the house and got to car door she saw these lights. she kept yelling at me get out of the car get out of the car, "what is it what is it" i took a minute was really not wanting to get out but i did. i walked around car to where wife was and looked up to see a large group lights traveling across the sky from sw towards ne right over my house. they were not in a recognizable formation but they appeared to be traveling together in same direction some a slightly different speeds and altitudes. we observed at least 30 of these orbs of bright light. the duration of fly over was about 2 and a half to 3 minutes until they all disappeared over the horizon in a northeasterly direction.

i have seen many shooting stars (meteorites)these in my opinion were not anything reentering earth's atmosphere. these lights were moving slower in a controlled flight path if they lost any altitude it was subtle the seemed to be moving quickly in a controlled way. they were not flares. they looked like balls light /energy not any known aircraft. my wife snapped some cell phone pics but they are low quality.


i am a 42 year old ex military man. i have seen a lot of things many aircraft. these i could not explain or identify . this sight has made a huge impression on my wife and me. we believed we saw something very unique.
content.summary: My wife and i observed 30 or more yellow red balls of light flying in group from sw towards ne

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving north on the 805 freeway at approximately 8:45pm tonight 11/11/11. during the drive i pointed out how bright the moon was tonight and how high it was in the sky. i pointed out how it made everything in the sky really visable and we began to look at stars. we pointed out some stars, and a few planes. the planes that we saw were all flying westward in their usual manner with normal headlights. we drove around a bend and spotted the north star which is a pretty large and bright star in general. as we came around a corner fully, just around the hill, we spotted a very large bright looking light that was just west of the north star but much larger and much brighter by about 4 times. we both immediately shouted "whoa! what is that?" at first we thought it was a star, but quickly ruled that out as to how large and bright it was. as we kept going i kept my eyes on the light never taking them off of it. we noticed that the light was not moving, it was completely stationary. all the other planes and helicopters were moving around the sky, blinking, and lit up in a normal fashion, but this object was hovering and brighter than anything else in the sky. i thought to myself, maybe it was one of those towers for the planes, but there was no tower under the light, i thought maybe it was a helicopter, but as we got closer the lights became more distinct, and started to become a shape, i began to think maybe it was a spot light, but the light never moved. the object was hovering, and as we got close to it it appeared to be in the shape of a rounded triangle, almost like a boomerang. the object had no tail, and no "wings". as we kept driving, we started to drive straight for it, and ended up driving almost directly under the object. it stood in place the entire time, hovering. i saw the outline of the object and the lights were directly under the object in a triangle shape. one light then two lights underneath the top light, very bright very white lights all on the bottom, directly in the middle of the object. there were two smaller lights, very tiny, at either end of the object that would blink on and off very slowly in an almost fading type of blink. i saw that there were two lighter grey looking stripes on each "wing" or end of the object. the object itself was a very flat black color, no shine or reflections of the lights to the object. i opened the moon roof so i could get a better look at it as we drove under it, we were saying to each other, "what is that?" "why is it just sitting there?" "why isn't it moving?" is it a helicopter?" "there is no tail, no wings!?" i noticed that there was no sound, this object was about as big as a military fighter jet, almost the same looking shape, but no sound, and no movement, and about a mile to two miles above us. as we tried to keep it in view while we drove under it, the driver started to hit the bumps on the next lane, so we both looked forward as she naturally swerved, i quickly looked back and the object was gone. we looked all over the sky, in front on sides, in back, i even jumped in the back seat and saw nothing. the sighting itself was exciting, neither of us were fearful or upset in anyway, we just found ourselves very curious and excited to see more.
content.summary: Sighted hovering boomerang like object above freeway. object did not move while sighted, then disappeared from sight after a few minutes. object hovered silently.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front porch, looking out due west at the clear, starry sky. straight ahead, i noticed a white light moving horizontally, from west to north, just above the tree line. i thought it odd that it was so low and close, yet i heard no noise. my view was partially blocked by a few leafless trees, so i could not be sure if the light was steady or blinking. it moved with a steady velocity, neither slowing nor speeding up. it was moving towards dense forest, and would soon be blocked from my vision, so i walked down my driveway to observe for as long as possible. i watched it until i could no longer see it. oddly enough, i did also see a shooting star just west of the light, while i was standing in my driveway. this was an interesting comparison to me, because what i'm reporting was definitely not a meteor. i do live about 30 miles from an airport which used to be the site of an air force base and also about 10 miles from a smaller airport. i have seen every sort of aircraft imaginable, but nothing like this. i felt the need to report this because it was so odd, low, close and soundless.
i reported this on another site, but it doesn't get updated as often as this one. came here looking to see if anyone else had reported anything similar around the same date.
content.summary: Soundless white light moving horizontally just above tree line

content.detailedDescription: I have a video... its a lot to type over my phone
content.summary: I have video
